Html:
Hello! How to unite lines in Phpexcel? For example, I need to unite the lines of A1:a5

In russian

Как объединить строки в PHPExcel? Например, мне нужно объединить строки A1:A5

'fraid I don't speak Russian, so I'm trying to guess what you mean.

Are you trying to merge the cells?

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->mergeCells('A1:A5');
Yes! MarkBaker, thank You, to you large!
